description: reviw plugin hooks - commit review reminders, E2E policy enforcement, and workflow enforcement

hooks.command: bash -c 'if echo "$CLAUDE_TOOL_INPUT" | grep -qE "git commit|git push"; then echo "[reviw-plugin] Reminder: Have you run /done and reviewed with reviw before committing?"; fi'

bash -c 'if echo "$CLAUDE_FILE_PATH" | grep -qE "\.(e2e|spec)\.(ts|tsx|js)$"; then echo "[reviw-plugin] E2E Test Warning: Remember the E2E Policy from /do - NO mocks, NO shortcuts, NO direct goto (except first /). Review agents WILL reject violations."; fi'
